revision.text:
'''''Walt Disney's Classic Cartoon Favorites''''' is a series of [[DVDs]] by [[Walt Disney Home Video]]. Each release would feature around one hour of ''[[Disney]]'' [[animated]] [[short films]], grouped by a starring character or a theme. It is based on the original [[Walt Disney Cartoon Classics]] line of videotapes of the 1980s. As opposed to the chronological nature of the ''[[Walt Disney Treasures]]'' line, each release would feature various cartoons in no particular order. The series featured a total of four waves of releases, between January 11, 2005 and April 11, 2006. Another very similar line was ''[[Walt Disney's Funny Factory]]''.
==Releases== ===Wave One=== The first wave of releases came on January 11, 2005. Each release focuses on a particular character, or pair of characters.
====Volume 1: Starring Mickey==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Mickey Mouse]] #''[[Mickey's Circus]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada) #''[[Mickey's Garden]]'' (1935)(1941 in Canada) #''[[The Little Whirlwind]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[On Ice (film)|On Ice]]'' (1935)(1941 in Canada) #''[[Hawaiian Holiday]]'' (1937)(1943 in Canada) #''[[Moving Day (1936 film)|Moving Day]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada) #''[[Orphan's Picnic]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada)
====Volume 2: Starring Donald==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Donald Duck]] #''[[Inferior Decorator]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Don Donald]]'' (1937)(1943 in Canada) #''[[Golden Eggs]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[Bee at the Beach]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Dog Laundry]]'' (1940)(1946 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Vacation]]'' (1940)(1946 in Canada) #''[[Old MacDonald Duck]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[Chef Donald]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada)
====Volume 3: Starring Goofy==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Goofy]] #''[[The Art of Skiing]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[How to Fish]]'' (1942)(1948 in Canada) #''[[How to Swim]]'' (1942)(1948 in Canada) #''[[Baggage Buster]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[How to Dance]]'' (1953)(1959 in Canada) #''[[Lion Down]]'' (1951)(1957 in Canada) #''[[The Big Wash]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Hold That Pose]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Father's Day Off]]'' (1953)(1959 in Canada)
====Volume 4: Starring Chip 'N Dale==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Chip 'N' Dale]] #''[[Chicken in the Rough (film)|Chicken in the Rough]]'' (1951)(1957 in Canada) #''[[Chip an' Dale]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[Out of Scale]]'' (1951)(1957 in Canada) #''[[Two Chips and a Miss]]'' (1952)(1958 in Canada) #''[[Food for Feudin']]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Working for Peanuts]]'' (1953)(1959 in Canada) #''[[Out on a Limb (1950 film)|Out On a Limb]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Three for Breakfast]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Dragon Around]]'' (1954)(1960 in Canada)
===Wave Two=== The second wave of releases came on May 31, 2005. Each release has a general theme.
====Volume 5: Extreme Sports Fun==== All of the shorts on here feature [[sports]]. #''[[Canine Caddy]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[How to Play Baseball]]'' (1942)(1948 in Canada) #''[[The Hockey Champ]]'' (1939)(1945 in Canada) #''[[Double Dribble (Disney cartoon)|Double Dribble]]'' (1946)(1952 in Canada) #''[[How to Play Football]]'' (1944)(1950 in Canada) #''[[Mickey's Polo Team]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada) #''[[Tennis Racquet]]'' (1949)(1955 in Canada) #''[[Goofy Gymnastics]]'' (1949)(1955 in Canada)
====Volume 6: Extreme Music Fun==== All of the shorts on here feature [[music]]. #''[[Mickey's Grand Opera]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada) #''[[Music Land]]'' (1935)(1941 in Canada) #''[[Orphans' Benefit]]'' (1934)(1940 in Canada) #''[[Farmyard Symphony]]'' (1938)(1944 in Canada) #''[[Pluto's Blue Note]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[How to Dance (Disney)|How to Dance]]'' (1953)(1959 in Canada) #''[[Woodland Café]]'' (1937)(1943 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Dilemma]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada)
====Volume 7: Extreme Adventure Fun==== All of the shorts on here feature [[adventure]]. #''[[Mickey's Trailer]]'' (1938)(1944 in Canada) #''[[No Sail]]'' (1945)(1951 in Canada) #''[[Good Scouts]]'' (1938)(1944 in Canada) #''[[Hello Aloha]]'' (1952)(1958 in Canada) #''[[Old Sequoia]]'' (1945)(1951 in Canada) #''[[How to Ride a Horse]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[Trailer Horn]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Two Weeks Vacation]]'' (1952)(1958 in Canada)
===Wave Three=== The third wave of releases came on September 27, 2005. Each release has a [[holiday]] theme.
====Volume 8: Holiday Celebration with Mickey & Pals==== All of the shorts on here are [[holiday]]-themed. #''[[Mickey's Good Deed]]'' (1932)(1938 in Canada) #''[[Peculiar Penguins]]'' (1934)(1940 in Canada) #''[[The Clock Watcher]]'' (1945)(1951 in Canada) #''[[Rescue Dog]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[Corn Chips]]'' (1951)(1957 in Canada) #''[[Lend a Paw]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[Toy Tinkers]]'' (1949)(1955 in Canada)
====Volume 9: Classic Holiday Stories==== All of the shorts on here are [[holiday]]-themed. #''[[The Small One]]'' (1978)(1984 in Canada) #''[[Pluto's Christmas Tree]]'' (1952)(1958 in Canada) #''[[Mickey's Christmas Carol]]'' (1983)(1989 in Canada)
===Wave Four=== The fourth wave of releases came on April 11, 2006. Each release focuses on a pair of characters.
====Volume 10: Best Pals: Mickey & Minnie==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Mickey Mouse]] and [[Minnie Mouse]]. #''[[First Aiders]]'' (1944)(1950 in Canada) #''[[Bath Day]]'' (1946)(1952 in Canada) #''[[Pluto and the Gopher]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Figaro and Frankie]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[Mickey's Rival]]'' (1936)(1942 in Canada) #''[[The Nifty Nineties]]'' (1941)(1947 in Canada) #''[[Pluto's Sweater]]'' (1949)(1955 in Canada) #''[[Mickey's Delayed Date]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada)
====Volume 11: Best Pals: Donald & Daisy==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Donald Duck]] and [[Daisy Duck]]. #''[[Mr. Duck Steps Out]]'' (1940)(1946 in Canada) #''[[Cured Duck]]'' (1945)(1951 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Double Trouble]]'' (1946)(1952 in Canada) #''[[Sleepy Time Donald]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[Crazy Over Daisy]]'' (1950)(1956 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Dream Voice]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Crime]]'' (1945)(1951 in Canada) #''[[Donald's Diary]]'' (1954)(1960 in Canada)
====Volume 12: Best Pals: Mickey & Pluto==== All of the shorts on here feature [[Mickey Mouse]] and [[Pluto (Disney)|Pluto]]. #''[[Pluto's Housewarming]]'' (1947)(1953 in Canada) #''[[Pluto and the Armadillo]]'' (1943)(1949 in Canada) #''[[Cat Nap Pluto]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Pluto's Party]]'' (1952)(1958 in Canada) #''[[Pluto, Junior]]'' (1942)(1948 in Canada) #''[[Pluto's Fledgling]]'' (1948)(1954 in Canada) #''[[Plutopia]]'' (1951)(1957 in Canada) #''[[Pueblo Pluto]]'' (1949)(1955 in Canada)
